mapper.insert: insert into letsfutsal.game_match (stadium_id, renter_entity_id, match_type, match_date, start_hour, end_hour, gender, min_grade, max_grade, status) values (#{match.stadiumId}, #{match.renterEntityId}, #{match.matchType}, #{match.matchDate}, #{match.startHour}, #{match.endHour}, #{match.gender}, #{match.minGrade}, #{match.maxGrade}, #{match.status})
mapper.select: select * from letsfutsal.game_match where timestamp(match_date, start_hour) >= now() and match_date < date_add(curdate(), interval 8 day) order by status, match_date
